DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the efficacy and safety of the Occiflex device in the treatment of neck pain.
DOC.brief_title: Computerized Mobilization of the Cervical Spine Utilizing the Occiflex Device for the Treatment of Chronic Neck Pain
DOC.criteria: Patients with chronic neck pain: postwhiplash injury, myofacial pain, cervical facet joint disease and idiopathic chronic neck pain Radiculopathy Myelopathy Cerebral vascular disease Malignancy Osteoporosis Cervical disc herniation
